short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that replaces all instances of the word 'Product Hunt' with the word 'Bot Hunt', @rahulr047

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We are living in a post product world. You will no longer see products. Just bots. Bots. Everywhere.
